QueryTallyResultResponse.title: Query Tally Result Response
QueryTallyResultResponse.description: QueryTallyResultResponse is the response type for the Query/Tally RPC method.

yes_count.description: yes_count is the number of yes votes on a proposal.

abstain_count.description: abstain_count is the number of abstain votes on a proposal.

no_count.description: no_count is the number of no votes on a proposal.

no_with_veto_count.description: no_with_veto_count is the number of no with veto votes on a proposal.

cosmos.gov.v1.TallyResult.title: Tally Result
cosmos.gov.v1.TallyResult.description: TallyResult defines a standard tally for a governance proposal.
